description: Detects deinstallation of security products using WMIC utility
name: Wmic Uninstall Security Product
query: (process.command_line:*wmic* AND process.command_line:*product\ where\ * AND process.command_line:*call\ uninstall* AND process.command_line:*\/nointeractive* AND process.command_line:(*\ name\=* OR *caption\ like\ *) AND process.command_line:(*Antivirus* OR *AVG\ * OR *Crowdstrike\ Sensor* OR *DLP\ Endpoint* OR *Endpoint\ Detection* OR *Endpoint\ Protection* OR *Endpoint\ Security* OR *Endpoint\ Sensor* OR *ESET\ File\ Security* OR *Malwarebytes* OR *McAfee\ Agent* OR *Microsoft\ Security\ Client* OR *Threat\ Protection* OR *VirusScan* OR *Webroot\ SecureAnywhere* OR *Windows\ Defender* OR *CarbonBlack* OR *Carbon\ Black* OR *Cb\ Defense\ Sensor\ 64\-bit* OR *Dell\ Threat\ Defense* OR *Cylance\ * OR *LogRhythm\ System\ Monitor\ Service*))
author: Florian Roth
Nasreddine Bencherchali
